nodes.text: Tag was a younglings' playground game in which the player who was "it" chased the other players, trying to touch one of them, thereby making that individual "it" in his or her stead. That game was popular in the Slave Quarters Row of Mos Espa, Tatooine, around the time of the Invasion of Naboo. While holed up in an emergency shelter during one of Hoth's brutal nights, Han Solo joked with a physically injured and weakened Luke Skywalker that they could go out into the Hoth blizzard and play tag.
